definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Or with Mr. Jobs, if Apple had remained just Apple Computer?
sentences.chinese: 如果苹果只是苹果电脑，人们还会如此关注乔布斯吗？

sentences.english: He has been behind Apple’s push to unify the software that powers its mobile devices and its Macintosh computers.
sentences.chinese: 他一直致力于推进移动设备和苹果电脑软件的融合。

sentences.english: I am a MAC user. How do I view Powerpoint files?
sentences.chinese: 如果是苹果电脑装配的用户，怎样看幻灯片文件？

sentences.english: It remains unclear if Apple Computer, poised to launch its line of Intel-powered Macintoshes next year.
sentences.chinese: 他剩馀不明白的如果苹果电脑泰然自若下水。

sentences.english: And Macs can save you money over time.
sentences.chinese: 而且，从长远看，苹果电脑能够帮你省钱。

sentences.english: Desperation to get hold of Apple computers can lead to extreme behavior.
sentences.chinese: 不顾一切地想要得到苹果电脑会造成一些极端的行为。

sentences.english: But Apple computers cost more upfront.
sentences.chinese: 但是，苹果电脑的先期成本更高。

sentences.english: They’d receive an Apple computer as part of their membership perks.
sentences.chinese: 他们可以获得一台苹果电脑作为入会馈赠。

sentences.english: Apple has long boasted of the Mac's immunity to viruses and malware.
sentences.chinese: 苹果电脑一直以它的免疫电脑病毒和流氓软件而自傲。

sentences.english: Apple developed the G4 chip that runs at 500 megahertz.
sentences.chinese: 苹果电脑开发出G4芯片，其运行速度是500兆。

sentences.english: The heart of Apple's line starts at $1,199.
sentences.chinese: 苹果电脑高端机型一般来说起价在1，199美元。

sentences.english: Apple protects its computer casings against sparks with an internal metal "shield" so it can use plastics without a flame retardant.
sentences.chinese: 苹果电脑的外壳采用内部金属罩防火花，代替阻燃剂。

definition: Macintosh (brand of computers made by Apple)/Mac
tablet computer (iPad, Android devices etc)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
